name: test_update_task_invalid_id
description: Test task update with invalid ID returns 400 or 404 or 429
descriptionHtml: Test task update with invalid ID returns 400 or 404 or 429
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected 400, 404, or 429, got 524
assert 524 in [400, 404, 429]
 +  where 524 = <Response [524]>.status_code
statusTrace:

E   AssertionError: Expected 400, 404, or 429, got 524

E    +  where 524 = <Response [524]>.status_code
